skins.selfIntroduction: I am Avrora, a light cruiser. I started a famous revolution, but I cannot understand what happened to the world after that...
skins.acquisition: Здравствуйте! Avrora, reporting in. Along with the light of dawn, I shall bring you victory.
skins.login: Ah, Commander, you're back! Would you like some borscht?
skins.details: For combat to be the sole purpose of my existence is a strange and novel feeling.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I have a big heart? Thanks for the compliment.
skins.secretaryIdle2: As the herald of dawn, I shall bring light to everyone.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Bears? They’re pretty cute. I used to raise one.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You should express your feelings in a more passionate manner.

skins.shipDescription: "I am Avrora, the princess bound within this tower by a cruel fate... My beloved, please come for me soon..."
skins.acquisition: "I am Avrora, the princess bound within this tower by a cruel fate... My beloved, please come for me soon..."
skins.login: Ah, Commander, welcome back. Did you come to save me? Here, I'm all yours~
skins.details: Roleplaying as a damsel in distress is rather new and exciting. Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: This building's ambience and lighting are just right. Heehee~
skins.secretaryIdle2: "I won't surrender myself to fate. I pray that the light of dawn will reach even this dark place."
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even if my knight in shining armor was to come, they probably wouldn't be able to get past the bears... Just kidding~?
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm not particularly cold, you know? I'm actually pretty used to it. Commander, make sure you stay warm though.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: "The captured princess was toyed with by her tormentors..." Something like that won't happen to me, right?
